structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.history: Repealed 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 3. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Routing of highways through fourth, fifth or sixth-class city to reach first or second-class city.
